ygData.subject: RE: Black Silk Gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: i can back this up too.... i ve gone deep in the tower and also to the piano room no problem invisible, its a really eary feeling though, knowing that if i pop
ygData.messageBody:
i can back this up too.... i've gone deep in the tower and also to the piano
room no problem invisible, its a really eary feeling though, knowing that if
i pop visible due to a spike or something, its sure death. Everything cons
indif to me when i sing in that zone. i've had huge trains sit next to me
at the zone while i was invis. They stayed there a good 5 minutes while
they just buffed each other up. In this there was some ushers, ancilles,
sappers, thought corrupters or whatever they're called, i forgot what they
called. but anyways, none saw me, was creepy feeling though

Minkin
Sol Ro
still gloveless lev 36 questing fool

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mike Roach [SMTP:mroach@...]
> Sent: Friday, November 12, 1999 1:39 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Black Silk Gloves
>
> From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
>
> Using my invis song in Mistmoore I have conned indifferent to every single
> mob I have encountered thus far including will sappers. I believe that
> deep
> inside the castle there are some casters that will buff themselves and
> other
> mobs with see invisible but I have yet to encounter these myself. I was
> invisible to every single mob you mention in your post for 3 days of
> camping
> MM.
>
> I generally have camped in the Courtyard and when someone calls train I
> tell
> my group to gather round me and kick up invis. As the mobs pour out of
> the
> castle I target and con every one, all indifferent to us. I have not yet
> actually ventured INSIDE the castle so your mileage may vary although it
> has
> been posted that others have invis'd themselves successfully all the way
> into the music room from the front entrance of the castle with no trouble.
>
> -Faras
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Crysarra de'Danaan [mailto:lucretia_71@...]
> > Sent: Friday, November 12, 1999 12:23 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Black Silk Gloves
> >
> >
> > From: Crysarra de'Danaan <lucretia_71@...>
> >
> > will sappers are in mistmoore castle i believe although this is from
> > another source that someone told me about. somebody confirm for
> > me...they see invis and are quite nasty in general. They look like
> > really ugly hunched over women... i don't know what lvl but
> > at 25 or so
> > (the last time i saw one) they were deep red to me...shortly
> > after that
> > I quit hunting in Mistmoore...they usually come out with deathly
> > heralds and ushers and gypsies and are part of REALLY nasty
> > trains hehe
> > the kinds that leave the zone littered with (and i do mean littered
> > with) most of the people that happen to be in mistmoore and get in
> > their way.
> >
> > Crysarra
> > Chisarra
> >
> > --- roleplay@... wrote:
> > > What level and wherw are willsappers? I don't remember those..
> > >
> > > Ranian Aeleroth
